recipe.title: Chess Pie
ingredients: 9" pastry shell, uncooked, or 6 individual tart shells, uncooked
instructions: Cream the butter and sugar and add the egg yolks one at a time. Beat thoroughly after each addition. Blend in the grated lemon rinds, the salt and the lemon juice. Fill the pie or tart shells and bake in a 350°F. oven for 25-30 minutes.
NOTE: Chess pies are really best made as individual tarts.
